applications.title: Search configuration
applications.description: Paths for helper applications used by CollectiveAccess for media processing, PDF generation, metadata extraction and more.

ghostscript_app.description: Path to Ghostscript binary ("gs" command) (http://pages.cs.wisc.edu/~ghost/). Ghostscript is used to to identify and extract metadata from PDFs, as well as to create page images from PDF files for preview.

ffmpeg_app.description: Path to ffmpeg binary (http://ffmpeg.mplayerhq.hu/). ffmpeg is used to convert audio and video files, and to generate preview audio clips and image thumbnails.

dcraw_app.description: Path to dcraw binary (http://cybercom.net/~dcoffin/dcraw/). dcraw is used to convert a range of manufacturer-specific RAW image file formats into standard formats such as TIFF. It allows CollectiveAccess to accept RAW image files as if they were standard JPEG or TIFF files.

imagemagick_path.description: Path to directory containing ImageMagick binaries (http://www.imagemagick.org). ImageMagick is used to convert and transform image files, as well as to identify image file formats.

graphicsmagick_app.description: Path to GraphicsMagick binary (http://www.graphicsmagick.org). GraphicsMagick is used to convert and transform image files, as well as to identify image file formats.

pdftotext_app.description: Path to pdftotext binary (part of the xpdf package from http://www.foolabs.com/xpdf/). pdftotext is used to extract text from PDF files for indexing.

libreoffice_app.description: Path to LibreOffice binary (http://www.libreoffice.org/). Libreoffice is used to generate in-browser preview images from Microsoft Office formats (Word, Excel, Powerpoint) and to extract text from uploaded documents.

mediainfo_app.description: Path to MediaInfo binary (http://mediainfo.sourceforge.net/en/). MediaInfo is used to extract embedded metadata from uploaded media.

pdfminer_app.description: Path to directory containing PDFMiner (http://www.unixuser.org/~euske/python/pdfminer/index.html) scripts. PDFMiner is used to extract text from PDFs and to calculate locations of text on PDF pages for highlighting in the in-browser PDF viewer. PDFMiner is required for in-browser searches of PDFs with spatial highlighting.

exiftool_app.description: Path to ExifTool binary (http://www.sno.phy.queensu.ca/~phil/exiftool/). ExifTool is used to extract embedded metadata from uploaded media.

wkhtmltopdf_app.description: Path to wkhtmltopdf (http://wkhtmltopdf.org). wkhtmltopdf is generate PDF-format output. It is a faster alternative to the built-in PDF generator.

openctm_app.description: Path to OpenCTM ctmconv (convert 3d model to CTM format) binary (http://openctm.sourceforge.net). OpenCTM is used to compress 3d surfaces for faster loading.

meshlabserver_app.description: Path to Meshlab meshlabserver binary (http://meshlab.sourceforge.net). MeshlabServer is used to convert various 3d file formats into formats CollectiveAccess can parse and process.
